ValidationRule.description: Pre Sales Sprint 6 : D-2390 : Possible to close a PSRO without filling Outcome and reason
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Completed"), ISPICKVAL( PSR_Outcome__c , ""), OR(ISPICKVAL( Apttus_Approval__Approval_Status__c, "Not Submitted"), ISPICKVAL( Apttus_Approval__Approval_Status__c, ""),ISPICKVAL( Apttus_Approval__Approval_Status__c, "Approved")), $RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Pre_Sales_Risk_Opportunity_read_only', $Profile.Name <> $Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name)
